section.p: Before using this method, you need to call the (enabled:true) method to notify the App to enable and set up external rendering.
After a successful method call, the app pulls the decoded and mixed audio data for playback.

ul.li: After using this method, the App will not be able to get data from the callback.

Compared with callback, this method differs in:
`onPlaybackAudioFrame`: The SDK sends the audio data to the app through this callback. Any delay in processing the audio frames may result in audio jitter. Any delay in processing the audio frames may result in audio jitter.
: App actively pulls audio data. After setting the audio data parameters, the SDK adjusts the frame buffer and avoids problems caused by jitter in the external audio playback.
